title: France panorama. [No. 70/04]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. A thousand sails under a cupola - the Paris Pleasure-Boating salon. 2. French victories: Rugby - France versus Scotland at Murrayfield. Swiss skiing competition. 3. Universal medicine - a veterinary institute for the USSR. 4. The Bolchoi in Paris - the famed USSR troupe takes over the Paris Opera. 5. The art adventure - artist Yves Brayer has other muses besides painting, as he explains to sculptor Belmondo.
